suncertify.application - package suncertify.application
Provides the classes necessary to start and shut down an application.
suncertify.client - package suncertify.client
Provides the classes necessary for the client mode and the client GUI.
suncertify.db - package suncertify.db
Provides the DBAccess interface and its local data file implementation as well as all exception classes.
suncertify.db.domain - package suncertify.db.domain
Provides the classes of the application's domain model.
suncertify.db.lock - package suncertify.db.lock
Provides the classes of the application's locking system.
suncertify.remote - package suncertify.remote
Provides the classes necessary for the remote access via RMI.
suncertify.server - package suncertify.server
Provides the classes for the server mode and its GUI.
